__e: I have no pet sellsword to protect me.
Like you said, what's a hired man who doesn't stick to his word?
- Bob and Carol are already dead, and so is the mercenary who came after us at the Falls.
They're called the Hunters, mercenaries, and unlike me, there isn't a human part left in them.
You need someone to rebuild your army for you, someone to convince this lord and that lord to fight for you, to bring sellswords and pirates to your side.
They're called the Hunters, and they'll stop at nothing till every single one of us is erased from the face of history.
